function getStatusMessage(status) {
  switch (status) {
    case 'pending':
      return 'Your order is being processed';
    case 'shipped':
      return 'Your order is on the way';
    case 'delivered':
      return 'Your order has arrived';
    case 'cancelled':
      return 'Your order was cancelled';
    default:
      return 'Unknown status';
  }
}
